verse: हरेर्नाम्नश्च या शक्तिः पापनिर्हरणे द्विज। तावत्कर्तुं समर्थो न पातकं पातकी नरः॥

terms.हरेर्नाम्नः (Hareh nāmnaḥ): Of the name of Hari (Lord Vishnu)
terms.द्विज (dwija): O twice-born (referring to the Brahmin caste)

meaning: O twice": "born (Brahmin), the power of the name of Hari (Lord Vishnu) is capable of destroying sins. However, a sinful person is not capable of committing sin as much as the power of the name of Hari (Lord Vishnu).
